name: Little Black Hole
description:
This is maybe the first fully playable game of mine. It's about black and white holes and how to use them to get some objects from a place to another.

How to play it

1. You have to get the Asteroids from the starting portal (yellow) to the finish one (gray).

2. In the level UI there are 3 buttons. From the left to the right, the first one toggle the Hole Spawn function, the second one deletes all holes and the third one selects which type of hole you spawn (black/white).

Have fun !
